name: property
description: Defines properties within components that can be used for web services, ORM mapping, and accessor method generation. Properties are exposed as component metadata and follow component inheritance rules.

params.name: name
params.description: A string; a property name. Must be a static value.

params.name: type
params.description: A string; a property type name; data type.

params.name: default
params.description: This sets the default value on the property when the object is created.

params.name: displayname
params.description:
A value to be displayed when using introspection to show
information about the CFC. The value appears in parentheses
following the property name.

params.name: hint
params.description:
Text to be displayed when using introspection to show
information about the CFC. This attribute can be useful
for describing the purpose of the parameter.

params.name: access
params.description: The client security context from which the method can be invoked

params.name: getter
params.description: Specifies whether to generate getter methods or not

params.name: setter
params.description: Specifies whether to generate setter methods or not
